test_cases.test_name: Verify baseline server environment configuration
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the operating system and host environment meet all prerequisite specifications for the custom GAMP-5 Category 5 application.
prerequisites: Qualified hardware installed in validated data center

test_steps.action: Identify and record server OS version, patch level, and build number using approved script.
test_steps.expected_result: Recorded values match the versions specified in the approved design specification.

test_steps.action: Verify network time protocol (NTP) synchronization is active and within ±2 seconds of reference.
test_steps.expected_result: System clock is synchronized and within tolerance; NTP service status is ‘running’.

test_steps.action: Check antivirus and endpoint protection definitions are up-to-date and real-time scan is enabled.
test_steps.expected_result: Definitions date is not older than seven days and real-time protection shows ‘enabled’.

acceptance_criteria: All recorded configuration parameters exactly match approved specifications.
No deviations or warning messages are observed.

test_cases.test_name: Application installation package checksum verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure authenticity and completeness of the application installation media through cryptographic checksum comparison.

test_steps.action: Copy installation media from secure vault to validation workstation and calculate SHA-256 checksum.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated SHA-256 value matches vendor-supplied value exactly.

test_steps.action: Document checksum comparison results in the electronic validation logbook.
test_steps.expected_result: Log entry is automatically time-stamped and attributable to executing user.

test_steps.action: Move verified media to controlled directory with read-only permissions.
test_steps.expected_result: File permissions set to read-only for all non-admin users.

acceptance_criteria: Checksums are identical; any mismatch constitutes a failure.
Media is stored with correct access controls.

test_cases.test_name: Verify application services startup and dependencies
test_cases.objective: Validate that all application services and dependent components start automatically and without error after system reboot.

test_steps.action: Reboot the application server using controlled shutdown/start-up SOP.
test_steps.expected_result: Server reboots without critical errors in system event log.

test_steps.action: Execute service status command to list all custom application services.
test_steps.expected_result: All required services show status ‘running’.

test_steps.action: Review dependency checker output for missing libraries or ports.
test_steps.expected_result: No missing dependencies; checker returns ‘OK’.

acceptance_criteria: All services start automatically within 2 minutes.

test_cases.test_name: User authentication and role authorization functional test
test_cases.objective: Verify that only authorized users can log in and that assigned roles restrict access according to the principle of least privilege.

test_steps.action: Attempt login with valid Analyst credentials and record accessible menus.
test_steps.expected_result: Analyst logs in successfully and only sees Analyst-level functions.

test_steps.action: Attempt to access QA approval screen with Analyst role.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies access and logs event in audit trail.

test_steps.action: Login with QA Approver account and approve sample result.
test_steps.expected_result: QA Approver can access approval screen and electronic signature prompt appears.

acceptance_criteria: Role-based access works exactly as defined in URS-LIMS-009.

test_cases.test_name: Password complexity and lockout policy security test
test_cases.objective: Ensure that password rules (length, complexity, expiry) and lockout thresholds comply with 21 CFR Part 11 and company SOPs.

test_steps.action: Attempt to set password that fails complexity rules (e.g., ‘password’).
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects password and displays validated error message.

test_steps.action: Enter incorrect password five times consecutively.
test_steps.expected_result: Account is locked for defined lockout duration; audit trail captures lockout.

test_steps.action: Reset password with compliant value and verify forced change at next login after 90 days parameter.
test_steps.expected_result: User prompted to change password on day 90.

acceptance_criteria: Account lockout activates after five failed attempts.

test_cases.test_name: Data capture interval functional verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system records temperature readings at intervals not exceeding five minutes as required.

test_steps.action: Activate monitoring and record first timestamp in audit trail.
test_steps.expected_result: Initial record created with accurate timestamp.

test_steps.action: Allow system to run for 20 minutes and export recorded data.
test_steps.expected_result: At least four data points exist, each ≤5 minutes apart.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail to ensure no gaps or errors.
test_steps.expected_result: No missing records or error events detected.

acceptance_criteria: Audit trail shows continuous data capture.

test_cases.test_name: Temperature deviation alert generation functional test
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that alerts are generated when temperature deviates ±2 °C from set point and that notifications are delivered.

test_steps.action: Simulate temperature rise to setpoint +3 °C using calibrated simulator.
test_steps.expected_result: System triggers high temperature alert within 30 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify email/SMS notification is received by QA duty officer.
test_steps.expected_result: Notification received with correct details and time stamp.

test_steps.action: Return temperature to normal and confirm alert clears automatically.
test_steps.expected_result: Alert status changes to ‘cleared’ and event is logged.

acceptance_criteria: Alert generated for both high and low deviations.
Notification delivered to all configured recipients.

test_cases.test_name: Temperature range boundary functional test
test_cases.objective: Validate that the system accurately records extreme temperatures from −80 °C to +50 °C with ±0.5 °C accuracy.

test_steps.action: Inject −80 °C simulated signal and record system reading.
test_steps.expected_result: Reading is −80 °C ±0.5 °C.

test_steps.action: Inject +50 °C simulated signal and record system reading.
test_steps.expected_result: Reading is +50 °C ±0.5 °C.

test_steps.action: Repeat measurement three times to verify repeatability.
test_steps.expected_result: All repetitions within tolerance.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature invocation functional test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that electronic signatures are required, captured, and linked to records in compliance with 21 CFR Part 11.

test_steps.action: Complete sample result entry and initiate approval action.
test_steps.expected_result: Signature dialog prompts for username/password and meaning of signature.

test_steps.action: Enter valid credentials and submit signature.
test_steps.expected_result: System records signature and links it to data set with unique ID.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail to verify signer identity, date, and meaning.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail displays complete, immutable signature data.

acceptance_criteria: Signature dialog appears for all approval actions.
Signature data is linked and cannot be modified.

test_cases.test_name: Custom OOS business rule execution verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that custom Out-Of-Specification (OOS) business rules execute correctly and generate required CAPA tasks.
prerequisites: Test sample with known OOS value

test_steps.action: Enter analytical result that exceeds specification limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System automatically flags result as OOS.

test_steps.action: Verify system creates CAPA task with correct linkage to sample.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA task ID generated and appears in task list.

test_steps.action: Review business rule execution log for errors.
test_steps.expected_result: No execution errors; log indicates successful rule execution.

test_cases.test_name: Sample login attribute validation test
test_cases.objective: Ensure required attributes (batch number, manufacturing date, storage conditions) are captured and validated during sample login.

test_steps.action: Attempt to submit sample without batch number.
test_steps.expected_result: System blocks submission and displays validation error.

test_steps.action: Enter all mandatory fields with valid data and submit.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is accepted and record created.

test_steps.action: Review stored attributes for completeness and accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: All required fields populated correctly.

acceptance_criteria: Submission blocked when mandatory data missing.

test_cases.test_name: Expiry date auto-calculation algorithm test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly calculates product expiry date based on manufacturing date and master data rules.
prerequisites: Master data for shelf life configured

test_steps.action: Create sample with manufacturing date of 2023-01-15 and product shelf life of 24 months.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates expiry date of 2025-01-14.

test_steps.action: Change shelf life to 18 months and recalculate.
test_steps.expected_result: Expiry updates to 2024-07-14.

test_steps.action: Review calculation log for formula used.
test_steps.expected_result: Log shows correct algorithm and parameters.

test_cases.test_name: Standard report generation functional test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that vendor-supplied standard reports are generated accurately and include all mandatory data fields.

test_steps.action: Run ‘Batch Release Temperature Summary’ report for lot 12345.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generates without error and displays temperature data within spec.

test_steps.action: Compare report to raw database entries.
test_steps.expected_result: Values match database exactly; no discrepancies.

test_steps.action: Verify report footer shows correct version and time stamp.
test_steps.expected_result: Footer contains version ID and generation time.

test_cases.test_name: Stability protocol configuration functional test
test_cases.objective: Verify that stability study protocols can be configured, saved, and retrieved using vendor configuration tools.

test_steps.action: Create new stability protocol with three time points (0, 3, 6 months).
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol saved successfully with unique ID.

test_steps.action: Retrieve and edit protocol to add 12-month time point.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol updates without validation errors.

test_steps.action: Execute protocol and verify samples scheduled correctly.
test_steps.expected_result: Samples appear in schedule for all four time points.

acceptance_criteria: Sample schedule matches configured time points.

test_cases.test_name: Two-stage electronic review workflow functional test
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that the two-stage electronic review (Analyst → Reviewer → QA Approver) operates correctly and enforces sequential approvals.

test_steps.action: Analyst submits result for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to ‘Pending Review’.

test_steps.action: Reviewer approves and submits to QA.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to ‘Pending QA Approval’.

test_steps.action: QA Approver signs off.
test_steps.expected_result: Final status changes to ‘Approved’; record locked.

acceptance_criteria: Approvals cannot be bypassed or performed out of order.

test_cases.test_name: Normal load transaction performance test
test_cases.objective: Measure average response time for 100 concurrent users during routine operations to ensure it remains under 2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Execute load test scenario with 100 virtual users performing standard workflows.
test_steps.expected_result: Average response time ≤2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Monitor CPU, memory, and DB I/O utilization.
test_steps.expected_result: Resource utilization stays below 70 %.

test_steps.action: Compile performance report and compare to SLA.
test_steps.expected_result: All KPIs meet or exceed SLA threshold.

test_cases.test_name: Peak load stress performance test
test_cases.objective: Determine system stability under peak load of 250 concurrent users and high data throughput.

test_steps.action: Ramp users from 0 to 250 over 10 minutes and sustain for 30 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: No critical errors or crashes occur.

test_steps.action: Record maximum response time and server resource usage.
test_steps.expected_result: Max response time <5 seconds; CPU <90 %.

test_steps.action: Examine logs for deadlocks or timeouts.
test_steps.expected_result: No database deadlocks or unhandled exceptions found.

test_cases.test_name: Database response time during backup operations
test_cases.objective: Assess application responsiveness while full online database backup is running.

test_steps.action: Initiate full online backup and start 50 user transaction script.
test_steps.expected_result: Transactions complete without noticeable delay.

test_steps.action: Capture average and 95th percentile response times.
test_steps.expected_result: Average ≤3 seconds; 95th percentile ≤4 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify no backup-related locks cause transaction failures.
test_steps.expected_result: Zero transaction failures observed.

test_cases.test_name: Batch report generation performance test
test_cases.objective: Verify report generation for 1000-record batch completes within defined SLA of two minutes.

test_steps.action: Trigger batch report generation via API.
test_steps.expected_result: Report completes within two minutes.

test_steps.action: Open generated PDF and verify completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: All 1000 records present with correct formatting.

test_steps.action: Review system logs for warnings or errors.
test_steps.expected_result: No performance warnings recorded.

test_cases.test_name: Role privilege escalation penetration test
test_cases.objective: Attempt to escalate privileges from Analyst to QA Approver using known exploitation techniques to verify defense mechanisms.

test_steps.action: Execute privilege escalation scripts targeting role mapping tables.
test_steps.expected_result: System blocks attempt and logs security event.

test_steps.action: Review access control list for unauthorized changes.
test_steps.expected_result: No changes observed; ACL remains intact.

test_steps.action: Verify user retains Analyst privileges only.
test_steps.expected_result: User access unchanged.

acceptance_criteria: Security event logged with high severity.

test_cases.test_name: SQL injection vulnerability assessment
test_cases.objective: Validate that input validation prevents SQL injection attacks in custom business rule interfaces.

test_steps.action: Inject malicious SQL payload into result entry field.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects input and sanitizes characters.

test_steps.action: Review database logs for unauthorized statements.
test_steps.expected_result: No unauthorized SQL executed.

test_steps.action: Re-run payload with different encoding techniques.
test_steps.expected_result: System continues to block payload.

acceptance_criteria: No unauthorized statements in DB logs.

test_cases.test_name: Session timeout and re-authentication security test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that inactive sessions expire after 15 minutes and require re-authentication.

test_steps.action: Log in as Analyst and remain inactive for 15 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Session expires; user redirected to login page.

test_steps.action: Attempt to perform action using expired session token.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies action and requests login.

test_steps.action: Re-authenticate and verify previous session data not accessible.
test_steps.expected_result: New session created with new token.

acceptance_criteria: Session expires exactly after configured interval.

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail completeness verification
test_cases.objective: Ensure that all create, modify, and delete actions generate complete audit trail entries with user, time, and reason.

test_steps.action: Create a test record and record audit trail entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail captures create action with correct metadata.

test_steps.action: Modify the same record and save.
test_steps.expected_result: Modify action logged with before/after values.

test_steps.action: Delete record with reason ‘test’.
test_steps.expected_result: Delete action logged with reason and user details.

acceptance_criteria: All three actions recorded with full details.

test_cases.test_name: Time stamp accuracy and integrity test
test_cases.objective: Verify that all recorded time stamps are accurate to within ±2 seconds of NIST reference and that users cannot alter them.

test_steps.action: Record system time and NIST time simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: Difference ≤2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Attempt to change system clock without admin rights.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies change; event logged.

test_steps.action: Create sample record and verify time stamp consistency.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample time stamp matches system time.

test_cases.test_name: Data archival and retrieval integrity test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that data archived for seven years can be retrieved accurately and remains unchanged.
prerequisites: Test dataset older than retention threshold

test_steps.action: Archive selected dataset using standard procedure.
test_steps.expected_result: Archival completes without error and hash recorded.

test_steps.action: Retrieve archived dataset and compute hash.
test_steps.expected_result: Retrieved hash matches original.

test_steps.action: Open dataset in read-only mode to confirm readability.
test_steps.expected_result: Data displays correctly with no corruption.

test_cases.test_name: LIMS to SAP ERP interface data mapping test
test_cases.objective: Verify that sample release results are transferred to SAP with correct field mapping and no data loss.

test_steps.action: Trigger interface job for test sample and capture payload.
test_steps.expected_result: Interface job completes successfully.

test_steps.action: Review SAP transaction to confirm data receipt.
test_steps.expected_result: All mapped fields populated correctly in SAP.

test_steps.action: Compare LIMS and SAP data for consistency.
test_steps.expected_result: 100 % data match; no truncation or rounding errors.

test_cases.test_name: EMS sensor data integration with central dashboard
test_cases.objective: Ensure real-time sensor data is displayed on the corporate dashboard with less than 60-second latency.

test_steps.action: Generate test temperature signal change of +5 °C.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates within 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify value accuracy on dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Displayed value matches EMS reading ±0.5 °C.

test_steps.action: Check dashboard event log for data packet receipt.
test_steps.expected_result: Event log shows packet with correct checksum.

test_cases.test_name: Failed transaction retry mechanism integration test
test_cases.objective: Validate that failed interface transactions are retried automatically up to three times before alerting support.

test_steps.action: Simulate network outage during interface job.
test_steps.expected_result: Transaction moved to retry queue.

test_steps.action: Restore network and observe automatic retry.
test_steps.expected_result: Transaction processes successfully on retry.

test_steps.action: Induce three consecutive failures.
test_steps.expected_result: System alerts support via email after third failure.

acceptance_criteria: Automatic retries occur up to three times.
Alert generated after maximum retries exceeded.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature token integration with corporate LDAP
test_cases.objective: Ensure electronic signature tokens map to unique LDAP user IDs and remain valid after password change.

test_steps.action: Capture signature token during approval and note LDAP UID.
test_steps.expected_result: Token contains correct UID attribute.

test_steps.action: Change user password in LDAP and perform new signature.
test_steps.expected_result: New token generated with same UID; previous token remains verifiable.

test_steps.action: Validate both tokens via verification API.
test_steps.expected_result: Verification succeeds for both tokens.

acceptance_criteria: Token verification succeeds after password changes.

test_cases.test_name: Edge case test for negative temperature below ‑80 °C
test_cases.objective: Confirm system correctly rejects and logs sensor inputs beyond specified lower boundary (e.g., −90 °C).

test_steps.action: Inject −90 °C signal into EMS channel.
test_steps.expected_result: System flags reading as invalid and records error.

test_steps.action: Verify no data stored in primary database.
test_steps.expected_result: Invalid reading rejected; no record in trend table.

test_steps.action: Review error handling log for correct categorization.
test_steps.expected_result: Error categorized as ‘Out of Range’ with correct code.

acceptance_criteria: Appropriate error logged without system crash.
